member.name: M:TotalCoding.Cartipay.RestApi.Controllers.InvoiceController.Create(TotalCoding.Cartipay.Shared.Models.Invoice.InvoiceRequest)
member.summary: Creates a new transaction and generates a token. We excpect the api key, amount and the callback url We save the transaction and set token and the callback url
member.remarks:
Sample request:
api_key = daddfefefefefe9089034fdsfds amount = 50000 return_url = http://returnurl.com
member.response: If parameters are invalid
if there is an internal server error

member.name: M:TotalCoding.Cartipay.RestApi.Controllers.InvoiceController.Check(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the status of the transaction with the requested token We don't call the bank bot in this request, we only check from our database. Bank bot web job service checks the status and updates the database
